author: tienna
title: Catalyst Events 4 Vietnam Students
description: Many Vietnam Uni students are unaware of Project Catalyst's funding campaigns and the opportunities that exist.
solution: Organize virtual or onsite sharing events about Catalyst for students. Connect, motivate and support students to participate in Catalyst.
experience: We are SPOs, blockchain tech-savvies, Eastern Townhall moderators/co-hosts, and funded project owners
